name: Aberration Hunters' Amulet
location: Dropped as loot by Ghustil Stornugoss. 🎁
description:
Advantage on Intelligence Saving Throws if you are Githyanki. 
Advantage on Attack Rolls against aberrations and aberrations have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.

name: Absolute's Talisman
location: Dropped as loot by Priestess Gut. 🎁
description:
Advantage on Death Saving Throws if you bear the Absolute's Brand
Cast Aid once per Long Rest. This casting of Aid only affects the caster.

name: Absolute's Warboard
location: Dropped as loot by Priestess Gut. 🎁
description:
Gain a +1 bonus to Saving Throws if you bear the Absolute's Brand.
Cast Heroism once per Long Rest.

name: Abyss Beckoners
location: Inside a locked chest in a cell.
description:
Your summoned creatures have resistance to all damage except Psychic.
At the start of your summoned creature's turn, it must succed a Wisdom Saving Throw or be driven Mad.

name: Adamantine Longsword
location: Forged in The Adamantine Forge with a Longsword Mould and Mithral Ore.
description:
This weapon ignores Resistance to Slashing damage.
If you hit an object with this weapon, the hit is always Critical.

name: Adamantine Mace
location: Forged in The Adamantine Forge with a Mace Mould and Mithral Ore.
description:
This weapon ignores Resistance to Bludgeoning damage. 
If you hit an object with this weapon, the hit is always Critical.

name: Adamantine Scale Mail
location: Forged in The Adamantine Forge with a Scale Mail Mould and Mithral Ore.
description:
Reduce all incoming damage by 1.
When a creature hits you with a melee attack, you send it Reeling for 2 turns.
Attackers can't land Critical Hits on you.

name: Adamantine Scimitar
location: Forged in The Adamantine Forge with a Scimitar Mould and Mithral Ore.
description:
This weapon ignores Resistance to Slashing damage.
If you hit an object with this weapon, the hit is always Critical.

name: Adamantine Shield
location: Forged in The Adamantine Forge with a Shield Mould and Mithral Ore.
description:
When a creature misses a melee attack against you, you send it Reeling for 2 turns.
When you are hit with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw.
Attackers can't land Critical Hits on you.

name: Adamantine Splint Armour
location: Forged in The Adamantine Forge with a Splint Mould and Mithral Ore.
description:
Reduce all incoming damage by 2.
When a creature hits you with a melee attack, you send it Reeling for 3 turns.
Attackers can't land Critical Hits on you.

name: Amulet of Branding
location: Dropped as loot by A'jak'nir. 🎁
description: Cast Brand the Weak once per Long Rest.

name: Amulet of Elemental Torment
location: Sold by Grat the Trader. 💰
description: When you stand on certain surfaces and cast a spell that deals damage, the target also suffers the surface's effects.

name: Amulet of Misty Step
location: In a gilded chest behind the ogre Polma.
description: Cast Misty Step once per Short Rest.

name: Amulet of Restoration
location: Sold by Derryth Bonecloak. 💰
description:
Cast Healing Word once per Long Rest.

name: Amulet of Selûne's Chosen
location: Found in Dror Ragzlin's treasure pile.
description: Cast Selûne's Dream once per Long Rest.

name: Amulet of Silvanus

description: Cast Lesser Restoration once per Long Rest.

name: Amulet of the Unworthy
location: Dropped as loot by a Minotaur. 🎁
description:
Resistance to Slashing damage.
Vulnerability to Bludgeoning damage.

name: Sickle of BOOOAL
location:
Dropped as loot or Sold by Pooldripp the Zealous. 💰 🎁

You can also receive this as a reward if you have one of your Origin Characters agree to be BOOOAL's champion.
description: Advantage on Attack Rolls against Bleeding creatures, as long as there are Kuo-toa to worship BOOOAL.

name: Silver Pendant
location: Found on a skeleton on the cliff southwest of the Druid Grove.
description: Cast Guidance

name: Skybreaker
location: Found in a locked chest in front of the Arcane Tower.
description: Cast Searing Smite once per Long Rest.

name: Slippery Chain Shirt
location: Found in a chest hidden on a cliff.
description: When you heal a creature, it automatically Disengages and won't trigger Opportunity Attacks.

name: Smuggler's Ring
location: Found on a Skeleton, hidden in a bush on the lower path following the river, near the broken bridge section at The Risen Road.
description:
Stealth +2
Sleight of Hand +2
Charisma -1

name: Sorrow
location: Found in the Hidden Vault by solving the Enclave Library Puzzle.
description: Cast Sorrowful Lash once per turn.

name: Soulbreaker Greatsword
location: Dropped as loot by Kith'rak Therezzyn. 🎁
description:
Deal an additional 👁️(1d4) if you are Githyanki.
Gain a +2 bonus to Initiative Rolls.

name: Speedy Reply
location: Found on the body of a dead caravan agent on The Risen Road, near the cave where gnolls are attacking the caravan's survivors.
description: On a hit, gain Momentum for 2 turns.

name: Spellthief
location: Sold by Arron. 💰
description: Regain a Level 1 Spell Slot when you land a Critical hit with the Spellthief once per Short Rest.

name: Spidersilk Armour
location: Dropped as loot by Minthara. 🎁
description:
Stealthy: Gain +1 bonus to Stealth Checks.
Advantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

name: Spiderstep Boots
location: Found in a heavy chest.
description: Immune to being Enwebbed. Your Movement Speed is not affected by web surfaces.

name: Springstep Boots
location: Found in Dror Ragzlin's treasure pile.
description: When you Dash or take a similar action, gain Momentum for 3 turns.

name: Spurred Band
location: Found on a skeleton.
description: When you start your turn with 50% Hit Points or less, gain Momentum for 1 turn.

name: Staff of Arcane Blessing
location: Found leaning up against a table in the basement of the Arcane Tower.
description:
Bless becomes Mystra's Blessing. 
Mystra's Blessing grants an additional 🎲(1d4) to Weapon Attack Rolls and Saving Throws, and an additional 🎲(2d4) to Spell Attack Rolls.
Cast Bless (Mystra's Blessing) once per Long Rest

name: Staff of Crones
location: Looted from the ground in the treasure room after beating Auntie Ethel.
description: Cast Ray of Sickness once per Short Rest.

name: Strange Conduit Ring
location: Found inside a chest in Inquisitor's Chamber.
description: Deal an additional 👁️(1d4) with weapon attacks while you are Concentrating on a spell.

name: Sunwalker's Gift
location: Sold by Blurg. 💰
description: Gain Darkvision.

name: Sussur Dagger
location: Quest Rewards by combining a Dagger with Sussur Tree Bark in the Blacksmith's Forge found in one of the buildings in the village.
description: On a hit, Silence target.

name: Sussur Greatsword
location: Quest Rewards by combining a Greatsword with Sussur Tree Bark in the Blacksmith's Forge found in one of the buildings in the village.
description: On a hit, Silence target.

name: Sussur Sickle
location: Quest Rewards by combining a Sickle with Sussur Tree Bark in the Blacksmith's Forge found in one of the buildings in the village.
description: On a hit, Silence target.

name: Svartlebee's Woundseeker
location: Dropped as loot by Gauntlet Yeva. 🎁
description: Gains a 🎲(1d4) bonus to Attack Rolls with this weapon when attacking creatures that have already taken damage.

name: Swiresy Shoes
location: Sold by Grat the Trader. 💰
description:
Jump distance is increased by 1.5m / 5ft.
Acrobatics +1

name: Sword of Justice
location: Quest Reward or Dropped as loot by Anders. 🎁
description: Cast Shield of Faith once per Long Rest.

name: Sword of Screams
location: Dropped as loot by Nere. 🎁

name: Tarnished Charm
location: Dropped as loot by Auntie Ethel. 🎁
description: The DC of Death Saving Throws for the wearer is lowered from 10 to 5.

name: The Amulet of Lost Voices
location: Found in a heavy chest in the same room that Withers emerges from.
description: Cast Speak with Dead once per Long Rest.

name: The Baneful
location: Sold by Blurg. 💰
description:
The Warlock bound to this weapon is always Proficient with it. The weapon's damage is magical.
Gain a +1 bonus to damage and Attack Rolls with this weapon.
On a hit, possibly inflict Bane your target.

name: The Blast Pendant
location: Dropped as loot by Dhourn. 🎁
description: Use a Bonus Action to consume Lightning Charges to deal additional damage on your next Lightning Spell or Cantrip once per Long Rest.

name: The Blood of Lathander
location: Quest Reward by Find the Blood of Lathander quest.
description:
Regain ❤️(2d6) Hit Points when your Hit Points are reduced to 0 once per Long Rest. Allies within 9m also regain ❤️(1d6) Hit Points.
This weapon shines with a glowing light in a radius of 6m. In combat, fiends and undead standing in the light are Blinded.
Cast Sunbeam once per Long Rest.

name: The Deathstalker Mantle
location: Given to a player using The Dark Urge Origin by Sceleritas Fel.
description: You can become Invisible for 2 turns after killing an enemy, once per turn.

name: The Ever-Seeing Eye
location: Looted from the ground in the treasure room after beating Auntie Ethel.
description: Cast Protection from Evil and Good once per Short Rest.

name: The Graceful Cloth (Esther)
location: Sold by Lady Esther. 💰
description:
Gain a +1 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws.
Jump distance is increased by 1.5m / 5ft.
Dexterity +2 (up to 20)

name: The Joltshooter
location: Optional Quest Reward by Counsellor Florrick.
description: When you deal damage with this weapon, gain 2 Lightning Charges.

name: The Jolty Vest
location: Sold by Brem. Only available after completing Quest by Zarys. 💰
description:
When you are hit with a melee attack while having Lightning Charges, the attacker must succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw or become Shocked.
You take 1 less Slashing damage.

name: The Lifebringer
location: Sold by Blurg. 💰
description: Gain ❤️(3) Temporary Hit Points when you gain Lightning Charges.

name: The Oakfather's Embrace
location: Found on a headless skeleton.
description: Deal ☀️(1d6) to the attacker if they are undead. Attackers that are beasts receive an additional ☀️(1d6).

name: The Protecty Sparkswall
location: Found in a Gilded Chest at the end of the trapped bridge.
description:
Gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC.
Gain a +1 bonus to Saving Throws and 🛡️ + 1 AC when you have Lightning Charges.

name: The Real Sparky Sparkswall
location: Found on a locked and trapped chest.
description: Use an Action to consume 3 Lightning Charges to Jolts nearby enemies and deal ⚡(1d4) once per Long Rest.

name: The Shadespell Circlet
location: Sold by Omeluum. 💰
description: While you are obscured in shadow, your spells gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC, making them more likely to succeed.

name: The Skinburster
location: Found inside a chest in Inquisitor's Chamber.
description: On a hit, gain Force Conduit for 2 turns.

name: The Sparkle Hands
location: Found in a wooden chest.
description:
On a hit with an unarmed attack, gain 2 Lightning Charges.
Advantage on Aattack Rolls against metal constructs and enemies weaing metal armour while you have Lightning Charges.

name: The Sparkswall
location: Found in a gilded chest in the Arcane Tower's basement.
description:
Immune to being Electrocuted.
Resistance to Lightning damage.

name: The Sparky Points
location: Optional Quest Reward by Counsellor Florrick.
description: When you deal damage with this weapon, gain 2 Lightning Charges.

name: The Spectator Eyes
location: Dropped as loot by the Spectator. 🎁
description:
Cast Ray of Fear once per Long Rest.
Cast Wounding Ray once per Long Rest.

name: The Speedy Lightfeet
location: Found inside a Heavy Chest in the cellar behind the windmill.
description:
When you Dash or take a similar action, gain 3 Lightning Charges.
Athletics +1

name: The Spellsparkler
location: Optional Quest Reward by Counsellor Florrick.
description: When you deal damage with a spell or cantrip, gain 2 Lightning Charges.

name: The Watcher's Guide
location: Found in a trapped sarcophagus.
description: On a miss, the next Attack Roll against that target gains True Strike.

name: The Watersparkers
location: Found in a chest near Minthara.
description:
Water becomes electrified when you stand in it during combat.
When you start your turn on an electrified surface, gain 3 Lightning Charges.

name: The Whispering Promise
location: Sold by main Merchants, item in Merchant Item Pool. 💰
description: When you heal a creature, grant them Bless for 10 turns.

name: Titanstring Bow
location: Sold by Brem. Only available after completing Quest by Zarys. 💰
description: Deal an additional 🎲(Strength Modifier) with this weapon.

name: Uncovered Mysteries
location: Found inside a small gilded chest on the Arcane Tower's 1st floor.
description: Cast Detect Thoughts once per Long Rest.

name: Unseen Menace
location: Sold by A'jak'nir Jeera. 💰
description:
This weapon is Invisible while equipped. It loses this property for 2 turns on a missed Attack Rolls.
While Invisible, you are Immune to Disarm, gain Advantage on Attack Rolls and you land a Critical Hit when rolling a 19.

name: Varsh Ko'kuu's Boots
location: Dropped as loot or given to you by Varsh Ko'kuu. 🎁
description:
Immune to Acidic Surfaces.
Resistance to Acid damage.

name: Very Heavy Greataxe
location: Dropped as loot by Fezzerk. 🎁
description: Gain Gargantuan Cleave weapon action.

name: Vision of the Absolute
location: Combine the Shaft of a Broken Spear found on the body of Edowin in the Forest west of the Druid Grove and the Head of a Broken Spear looted from the Owlbear in the Owlbear Nest.
description:
On a hit, the target must succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw or become Blinded. 
Deals an additional 🏹(2d6) to creatures that have multiple sets of eyes.

name: Vital Conduit Boots
location: Sold by A'jak'nir Jeera. 💰
description:
Gain ❤️(8) temporary Hit Points when you cast a Spell that requires Concentration.
Athletics +1

name: Wapira's Crown
location: Quest Reward by Zevlor.
description: Regain ❤️(1d6) Hit Points when you heal another creature.

name: Warped Headband of Intellect
location: Dropped as loot by Lump the Enlightened. 🎁
description: Increases Intelligence to 17.

name: Winter's Clutches
location: Sold by Lady Esther. 💰
description: When you deal Cold damage, inflict Encrusted with Frost for 2 turns.

name: Witchbreaker
location: Sold by A'jak'nir Jeera. 💰
description: Advantage on Attack Rolls against concentrating creatures.

name: Wondrous Gloves
location: Dropped as loot by a mimic disguised as a chest. 🎁
description: Gain 1 more use of Bardic Inspiration.

name: Wood Woad Shield
location: Dropped as loot by Wood Woads. 🎁
description: Use a Bonus Action to attack and possibly Ensnare your target once per Short Rest.

name: Worgfang
location: Found in a pile of bones in one of the cells within the Worg Pens.
description: Goblins have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.

name: Xyanyde
location: Dropped as loot by Minthara. 🎁
description: On a miss, automatically Cast Faerie Fire on the target (for 2 turns) once per Short Rest.
